TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlSchemaUnique extends System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaIdentityConstraint

summary.span: 將來自 XML 結構描述的 項目依 World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 規定表示。

span.span: Represents the element from XML Schema as specified by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C).

summary.span: 這個類別 (Class) 可用於識別一組元素中唯一的條件約束 (Unique Constraint)。

span.span: This class can be used to identify a unique constraint among a set of elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定屬性或項目值 (或屬性或項目值的組合) 在指定範圍內必須是唯一的。Specifies that an attribute or element value (or a combination of attribute or element values) must be unique within the specified scope. 條件約束名稱必須是唯一的結構描述內。The constraint name must be unique within a schema. ## Examples 下列範例示範使用`XmlSchemaUnique`類別。The following example shows the use of the `XmlSchemaUnique` class. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlSchemaUnique Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic Webdata XmlSchemaUnique Example/CPP/unique.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlSchemaUnique Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic Webdata XmlSchemaUnique Example/CS/unique.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlSchemaUnique Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic Webdata XmlSchemaUnique Example/VB/unique.vb#1)] 這個程式碼範例，會產生下列 XML 檔案。The following XML file is generated for this code example. [!code-xml[Classic WebData XmlSchemaUnique Example#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic Webdata XmlSchemaUnique Example/XML/example.xsd#2)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.
